channel.title: admin on B101nfo
channel.description: Recent content in admin on B101nfo

item.description: I am a bioinformatician doing my PhD at the IBD lab of Dr. Julià Panès under the supervision of Azucena Salas. My research interests include functional enrichment, transcriptomics, data integration and analysis outside comparisons. I have produced some pieces of software mainly in Bioconductor.
